title: Summer 2023 Patient Newsletters
sitename: Health Care for All. Advocacy for the Underserved.
cleaned_text: Celebrating and Educating at the First Community Healing Event Dr. Mychi Nguyen Speaks To NBC Bay Area About Lunar New Year Celebration COVID-19 Precautions AHS' Dr. Kimberly S.G. Chang and Board Member Luisa Blue selected to serve on the President's Advisory Commission on Asian Americans, Native Hawaiians, and Pacific Islanders (WHIAANHPI) DONATE TODAY! Your generosity changes lives At AHS, you'll have access to whole patient care—a complete range of medical, dental, and mental health services Scheduling, rescheduling, or canceling an appointment is fast and easy. Call us today and someone will be happy to help you. With locations all across the Bay Area, we have a facility near you. Find a location or service by visiting our Locations page.
